message: Accept this generous offer and we can split the money quickly!
Meet me halfway, let's split it down the middle!
You wanted to meet halfway, but I'm willing to compromise a bit more. Take it or leave it!
I'm not budging, but I'm willing to give you a bit more than before. Take it or leave it!
I'm not going to give up yet! Take a smaller share and let's end this!
You're not giving up, neither am I. I'll take a smaller share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
I'm not going to get taken advantage of either! You're getting a tiny share, take it or leave it!
You're getting desperate, I can tell. I'll take a small share, but I'm not going to let you take the whole pie!
You think I'm desperate? I'm just being realistic. Take what's left, it's almost nothing!
You're not going to get away with taking everything. I'll take a tiny share, but I'm not giving up yet!
You're really running out of options, Bob. Take what's almost nothing, and let's end this!
I'm not going to give up now. I'll take a tiny share, but I'm not walking away from this empty-handed!
